name: lmicl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

stmt.origin: lmif(c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
stmt.pretty: lmif(c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cstrkgld, nat2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(clmi, c3), c6))
-| wceq(c7, cfv(clng, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c6, crn(c7)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0 : c2 → c2))
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ c4 =(dist ` c3)
⊣ c5 =(Itv ` c3)
⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ TarskiG)
⊣ (w0 → c3[TarskiGDim> =]2)
⊣ c0 =((lInvG ` c3)` c6)
⊣ c7 =(LineG ` c3)
⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ ran(c7))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cstrkgld, nat2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(clmi, c3), c6))
-| wceq(c7, cfv(clng, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c6, crn(c7)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)∈ c2)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ c4 =(dist ` c3)
⊣ c5 =(Itv ` c3)
⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ TarskiG)
⊣ (w0 → c3[TarskiGDim> =]2)
⊣ c0 =((lInvG ` c3)` c6)
⊣ c7 =(LineG ` c3)
⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ ran(c7))

comment: Closure of the line mirror. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Dec-2019.)
